mapper.select: SELECT c.CHALLENGE_SEQ AS challengeSeq, c.CHALLENGE_TITLE AS challengeTitle, c.CHALLENGE_CONTENT AS challengeContent, c.CHALLENGE_STATUS AS challengeStatus, c.USER_ID AS userId, c.ENROLL_DATE AS enrollDate, c.CHALLENGE_IMG AS challengeImg, u.USER_NAME AS userName FROM TB_CHALLENGE c JOIN TB_USER u ON c.USER_ID = u.USER_ID ORDER BY c.CHALLENGE_SEQ DESC

SELECT c.CHALLENGE_SEQ AS challengeSeq, c.CHALLENGE_TITLE AS challengeTitle, c.CHALLENGE_CONTENT AS challengeContent, c.CHALLENGE_STATUS AS challengeStatus, c.USER_ID AS userId, c.ENROLL_DATE AS enrollDate, c.CHALLENGE_IMG AS challengeImg, u.USER_NAME AS userName FROM TB_CHALLENGE c JOIN TB_USER u ON c.USER_ID = u.USER_ID WHERE c.CHALLENGE_SEQ = #{challengeSeq}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO TB_CHALLENGE ( CHALLENGE_SEQ, CHALLENGE_TITLE, CHALLENGE_CONTENT, ENROLL_DATE, CHALLENGE_STATUS, USER_ID, CHALLENGE_IMG ) VALUES ( SEQ_CHALLENGE.NEXTVAL, #{challengeTitle}, #{challengeContent}, SYSDATE, #{challengeStatus}, #{userId}, #{challengeImg} )
mapper.update:
UPDATE TB_CHALLENGE SET CHALLENGE_TITLE = #{challengeTitle}, CHALLENGE_CONTENT = #{challengeContent}, CHALLENGE_IMG = #{challengeImg}
WHERE CHALLENGE_SEQ = #{challengeSeq}
